featured.text: It is predicted that driverless cars will be ready for sale within five years.

other.text: But this story written 40 years ago __(27)__ predicted the arrival of a recent method of genetic engineering—cloning.

definition.zh_def: 預測，根據現有的資訊或趨勢推斷未來的情況或事件。
definition.en_def: To declare or indicate in advance; to make an educated guess about a future event based on current information.
definition.example: Scientists predict that climate change will have significant impacts on weather patterns.
